column2: A Cross-Country Database of Fiscal Space

column3: The database provides a comprehensive set of 29 variables related to fiscal space for 202 countries over the period of 1990-2023. The indicators are grouped into four categories: government debt sustainability, balance sheet composition, external and private sector debt, and market access. Indicators related to sustainability gaps are available from the authors upon request (see contact information below).
M. Ayhan Kose, Sergio Kurlat, Franziska Ohnsorge, and Naotaka Sugawara
